attributes.action: Refund for Global Warming taxes if tempratures decline
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Survey of temperature reduction to be done over next few years  if the truth is that temperatures are falling - refund all Green taxes taken from general public - Congestion charge - Emission zone - excess fuel costs etc etc etc

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
